billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Provides that the New York state canal corporation may sell or lease canal lands or personal property to governmental entities for less than fair market value
summary: Provides that the New York state canal corporation may sell or lease certain canal lands or personal property to governmental entities for less than fair market value in the public interest.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to permitting the New York state canal corporation to make certain sales and leases of canal lands and personal property to governmental entities for less than fair market value
